pull.title: [Policy] Fix MAX_STANDARD_TX_WEIGHT check
pull.body: As suggested by the constant name and its comment in policy.h, a transaction with a weight of exactly MAX_STANDARD_TX_WEIGHT should be allowed. Users could be confused.

events.body: For reference this code was introduced in #2273.

I don't think this matters in practice, but agree it's more consistent with the naming and documentation.
utACK 492457f5c4ec3df5b8dc8dfed00a8236e3124f3b
If you adjust the condition for the mempool, please also adjust it for the wallet and p2p (orphan handling). You can use `git grep MAX_STANDARD_TX_WEIGHT` to find them.

events.message:
Fix MAX_STANDARD_TX_WEIGHT check

As suggested by the constant name and its comment in policy.h, a transaction with a weight of exactly MAX_STANDARD_TX_WEIGHT should be allowed
